text: 1. (6 points) A lumber mill produces boards that are 2,4,6,8, or 10 meters long. They are given trees with lengths uniformly distributed between 0 and 12 meters long and make one board from each tree, using as much wood as possible from each tree. Determine, approximately, the probability that after 1000 trees are harvested, the length of wasted wood exceeds = meters. Simplify your answer.
